channel.title: Transistor
channel.description: A podcast of scientific questions and stories, with many episodes hosted by key scientists at the forefront of discovery.
channel.itunes:summary: Transistor is a podcast of scientific curiosities and current events, featuring guest hosts, scientists, and story-driven reporters. Presented by radio and podcast powerhouse PRX, with support from the Sloan Foundation.
channel.itunes:author: PRX
channel.author: prxwpadmin@prx.org (PRX)
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast of scientific questions and stories featuring guest hosts and reporters.

item.title: Sidedoor from the Smithsonian: Shake it Up
item.description: For the next few episodes, we’re featuring the Smithsonian’s new series, Sidedoor, about where science, art, history, and humanity unexpectedly overlap — just like in their museums. In this episode: an astronomer has turned the night sky into a symphony; an architecture firm has radically re-thought police stations; and an audiophile builds a successful record … Continue reading Sidedoor from the Smithsonian: Shake it Up
item.content:encoded:
For the next few episodes, we’re featuring the Smithsonian’s new series, Sidedoor, about where science, art, history, and humanity unexpectedly overlap — just like in their museums.

In this episode: an astronomer has turned the night sky into a symphony; an architecture firm has radically re-thought police stations; and an audiophile builds a successful record company on under-appreciated sounds.

For even more from Sidedoor, subscribe in iTunes or wherever you get your podcasts.

Music credits under backannounce: “Candy” by Jahzzar.
item.itunes:title: Sidedoor iTunes title
item.itunes:subtitle: An astronomer has turned the night sky into a symphony.
item.itunes:summary: For the next few episodes, we’re featuring the Smithsonian’s new series, Sidedoor, about where science, art, history, and humanity unexpectedly overlap — just like in their museums. In this episode: an astronomer who has turned the night sky into a symphony.
item.itunes:author: PRX
